text:
If an arc is specified in an svg file which starts and finishes in the same 
place it causes problems.
The svgbrowser hangs (using cpu) and does not render anything, the transcoders 
hang and the data presented to the Graphics2D contains NaN values.

here is an example path with an arc:
<path style="stroke:black;fill:rgb(240,100,100)"
  d="M 117.0 36.0A 77.0 22.0 0 0 1 117.0 36.0L 117 58.0L 117.0 36.0z"/>
creator: keiron@aftexsw.com
